<@&1367819082019377202>  we have max_blob_commitments_per_block set to 32 on a minimal preset (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/master/presets/minimal/deneb.yaml#L6). 

This means that on minimal preset config we can never test any blob throughput 32+. This would delay potential local testing where we would wanna push the number of blobs higher than 32. 

Would everyone be ok to update this preset value to something higher like 256? - the change would only be for minimal preset.
